message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $10,500?
Alice, I understand you need a good price, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to buy the product.
